summary:
Today I am working at Robeco in the Emerging Markets Equity team, being responsible for emerging markets as co- portfolio manager of Robeco's Global SDG Engagement Fund. In addition, I take care of the Robeco's fundamental equity investments in Brazil and Africa (domestic). I've been working in the investment industry since 1997, having worked as portfolio manager in Brazil and in the UK, before coming to the Netherlands. 

I am a strong believer in sustainability, stewardship and impact, reason why I dedicate to our flagship impact strategy. I have been active in several study groups, discussions and forums related to sustainability within and outside Robeco.
